SELECT T1.PostId,T1.PostAgainst, T1.Reference, T1.FeeTyeCode,T1.PostingAmount,T1.PostDate, T1.ValueDate,T1.PartnerBankId ,T2.partnerBankName,T2.Accountno partnerBankAc, T2.acType partnerBankAcType ,T3.AccountSetId,T1.Remarks, T1.Version, T1.LastMntBy, T1.LastMntOn,T1.RecordStatus,T1.RoleCode, T1.NextRoleCode, T1.TaskId, T1.NextTaskId, T1.RecordType, T1.WorkflowId FROM FeePostings_Temp T1 INNER JOIN PartnerBanks T2 ON T1.PartnerBankId = T2.PartnerBankId Left outer Join Feetypes T3 ON T3.FeeTypeCode=rtrim(T1.FeeTyeCode)
union all
SELECT T1.PostId,T1.PostAgainst, T1.Reference, T1.FeeTyeCode,T1.PostingAmount,T1.PostDate, T1.ValueDate,T1.PartnerBankId ,T2.partnerBankName,T2.Accountno partnerBankAc, T2.acType partnerBankAcType , T3.AccountSetId,T1.Remarks, T1.Version, T1.LastMntBy, T1.LastMntOn,T1.RecordStatus,T1.RoleCode, T1.NextRoleCode, T1.TaskId, T1.NextTaskId, T1.RecordType, T1.WorkflowId FROM FeePostings T1 INNER JOIN PartnerBanks T2 ON T1.PartnerBankId = T2.PartnerBankId Left outer Join Feetypes T3 ON T3.FeeTypeCode=rtrim(T1.FeeTyeCode)
WHERE (NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 Expr1 FROM FeePostings_Temp WHERE (PostId = T1.PostId)))
